courseName: Criminal Psychology and Criminal Justice MSc/PGDip
facultyName: Faculty of Arts, Professional and Social Studies
description: LJMU's Criminal Psychology and Criminal Justice MSc is a new stand-alone qualification designed to enhance your career prospects in criminal justice agencies, the probation service and the police.This course is available to study full-time or part-time.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
